items.title: The Best Age-Tech Gadgets Tried and Tested by WIRED
items.description: As more and more age tech hits the market, I’ve been testing the most innovative gadgets for older folks and caregivers.

items.title: The Best Permanent Outdoor Lights (2025): Govee, Eufy, Lepro
items.description: DIY permanent eave lights that attach to the exterior of your home are becoming more popular. But are they worth the effort (and cost)?

items.title: Best Merino Wool T-Shirts (2025), Tried On and Tested
items.description: These merino wool T-shirts are the last shirt you’ll ever wear. I’m wearing one right now.

items.title: Baseus Inspire XH1 Headphones Review: Affordable Excellence
items.description: Watch out high-end models, these noise-canceling headphones are an amazing value.

items.title: Does Red-Light Therapy Work? (2025)
items.description: Even if the glowing mask scares your family, red-light therapy can rejuvenate skin and aid in muscle repair.
